00007   const double explorationthreshold = 1.0;

00010   const double maxval = 0.0;
00011 
00014   const double discountfactor = 1.0;
00015 
00019   const double epsilon = 0.01;
00020 
00025   const double modelbreadth = 1.0 / 16.0;
00026 
00031   const int resolutionfactor = 4;
00032 
00038   const double minweight = 0.01;
00039 
00043   const double minfraction = 0.01;
00044 
00045   StatePredicateRef truep = TrueStatePredicate::create();
00046   StatePredicateRef falsep = FalseStatePredicate::create();
00047   StateFunctionRef zerof = ZeroStateFunction::create();

00049   StateVariables dimensions;

00051 
00052 TaskRef get_task_hierarchy(taskspec_t *ts)
00053 {
00054   // Number of state variables
00055   const unsigned discrete_dim = getNumIntObs(ts);
00056   dimensions.clear();
00057   for (unsigned i = 0; i < discrete_dim; ++i)
00058     dimensions[i] = 1.0;
00059 
00060   const unsigned continuous_dim = getNumDoubleObs(ts);
00061   for (unsigned i = 0; i < continuous_dim; ++i) {
00062     const double max = getDoubleObsMax(ts, i);
00063     const double min = getDoubleObsMin(ts, i);
00064     dimensions[discrete_dim + i] = 1.0 / (max - min);
00065   }
00066 
00067   assert(getNumIntAct(ts) == 1);
00068   assert(getNumDoubleAct(ts) == 0);
00069   int firstaction = getIntActMin(ts, 0);
00070   int lastaction = getIntActMax(ts, 0);
00071   // Create primitive tasks.
00072   std::vector<TaskRef> primitives;
00073   for (int i = firstaction; i <= lastaction; ++i) {
00074     DynamicAveragerRef model_averager = KernelAverager::create(modelbreadth,
00075                                                                minweight,
00076                                                                minfraction,
00077                                                                dimensions);
00078     TaskRef task = PrimitiveTask::create("",
00079                                          i,
00080                                          explorationthreshold,
00081                                          maxval,
00082                                          model_averager,
00083                                          truep);
00084 
00085     primitives.push_back(task);
00086   }
00087 
00088   // Create root task
00089   AveragerRef value_averager =
00090     InterpolationAverager::create(resolutionfactor, dimensions);
00091   return CompositeTask::create("ROOT",
00092                                primitives.begin(),
00093                                primitives.end(),
00094                                truep,
00095                                falsep,
00096                                zerof,
00097                                value_averager,
00098                                discountfactor,
00099                                epsilon);
00100 }
